SearchPeople.ChildrenMessage: To find you a place to stay that fits your entire group along with correct prices, we need to know how old your child will be at check-out
petsDialogContent: are highly trained disability support aids that play an essential role in helping individuals with disabilities engage in daily tasks safely and confidently.

In many countries, travelers with assistance animals are entitled to book any accommodations without facing additional fees or conditions, even if pets aren’t allowed. Legal requirements on assistance animals vary based on location – familiarize yourself with local laws before traveling.
SearchPeople.petsLink: Read more about traveling with assistance animals
